faq.ques: Is the link shortening service free?
faq.ans: Yes! You can shorten up to 50 links for free.

faq.ques: Do I need an account to use the service?
faq.ans: No, you can shorten links without signing up. However, creating an account lets you save and manage your links.

faq.ques: Can I contact support if I face an issue?
faq.ans: Support is available only in paid plans.

faq.ques: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.ans: We currently accept credit/debit cards and mobile wallet payments in Egypt.

faq.ques: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.ans: Yes, you can cancel anytime. Your account will stay active until the end of the billing period.
